replies.bodyText: I think we can remove this, as AS states that DIRECTORY_DOCUMENTS requires API19.

replies.bodyText:
IT's needed
The statements said ">KITKAT" so basically "LOLLIPOP and above", I just rewrote it so we don't have any KITKAT references in the code anymore.
replies.author: AndyScherzinger

replies.bodyText: As discussed, removed since the check was wrong bc it is a v19 feature...
